## Purpose

::: col-sm-6
This website highlights work that I have carried out in Data Managment, Data Analysis and Training.

It also documents ongoing training in Salesforce with the intention of achieving Salesforce Administrator Certification.

## Background

Misean Cara supports missionaries who a assist with the material and spiritual needs and promote the development of peoples in countries less fortunate than Ireland.

## Business Understanding

| Insight                                                   | Analysis           |
|-----------------------------------------------------------|--------------------|
| Which subscribers are most profitable?                    | Descriptive        |
| Do these subscribers have different value to Misean Cara? | Hypothesis Testing |
| Will this new subscriber be profitable and by how much?   | Prediction         |
| What happens if I show this ad?                           | Causal             |
| What happened in the past when I showed this ad?          | Correlational      |
:::
